name: Raleigh Felton
title: Director of Design
about:
I am a designer with a love of smart thinking, surf culture, going against the grain, digital technology, and anything that can be turned into a sandwich.

I have a strong entrepreneurial spirit with the hopes of changing the lives of a few people, and hopefully more. I believe in giving people and clients the detail and attention that they deserve. I want the love and passion I have to shine through my work.

I have been blessed throughout my career to work with some of the best people in the industry across the country. I have been able to work on some of the top brands in the world. They include Apple, Nike, Nissan, Playstation, Lenovo, and Nationwide Insurance to name a few. I have also had the pleasure to work on start-up companies like Dognition.com, Pack Purchase, NextGlass.co and the non profit Paws 4 Ever. I even started my own brand, I AM NOW, and integrated my passions of style, design, and photography.

Some of my personal interests are surfing, music, photography, food, cooking, economics, hip-hop, snowboarding, and the beach. My favorite past time is hanging with my wife Kelsey, sons Leigh and Crew, and our little Shih-tzu, Lulu.
